response.json is the body of the following curl call:
-- req.sh --
curl -v -X POST http://localhost:8000/v1/completions -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{
"model": "llama3.2:1b",
"prompt": "tell me a joke",
"stream": false
}'
-- response.json --
{"id":"cmpl-8p5o2kKQvHx0KxVJXfzDKS","object":"text_completion","created":1716194078,"model":"llama3.2:1b","choices":[{"index":0,"text":"A man walked into a library and asked the librarian, \"Do you have any books on Pavlov's dogs and Schr√∂dinger's cat?\" \n\nThe librarian replied, \"It rings a bell, but I'm not sure if it's here or not.\"","finish_reason":"stop"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":29,"completion_tokens":55,"total_tokens":84}}
